item.description:
Experience where the online marketing community gathers to learn where new marketing is headed and how it is evolving. This fast-paced and information-packed event is your check-up on your existing business communication strategies, and your prescription for your future marketing.

  Join the CEOs of SnapKnot, AmpAgency, Interactive Media Strategies, and a panel of Bostonian entrepreneurs in discussing the new age marketing and how you can use it to put your business on the map.

* Networking hour will be held at the beginning and end of the event with Q&A

* Food & drinks will be served

* Win great prizes with Business Card Raffle Contest

* Tickets are cheaper online than at the door

Registration & information


***Students get 25% discount through EFactor EDU, where students can find international internships and build their startup!

Student registration
item.name: Startup Event: Cutting Edge Marketing
